name: CircleShift
description:
Circle shift is a straightforward, simple game about moving a circle around a maze with a unique and curious twist. Practice spatial reasoning and patience, as you manoeuvre your Circle shift using only the three points that define it.There is no game like Circle shift so if you're up for a challenge and want to try something new - this just might be the game for you.

I first though of the game when I was reading over a maths textbook and set myself the goal to publish it within the month.

Your objective is to move the circle over a goal by moving one of three points, while keeping it on the island.

You may only move one point at a time, and you have to keep all three, plus your circle, on the safe island area.

Each time you move a point counts as a move (although once moved a point can be moved until another is picked up). Try to solve each level with the lowest moves possible.
